pullrequest.title: Use dart 6.7 behavior for setting BoxedLcpSolver, as the 6.8 approach isn't working

content.raw:
well, we are getting a compilation error, not a compiler warning, so I think it's a little more than the deprecation, maybe an API change by adding the secondary solver pointer without a default value?

I agree that removing the time step will probably fix it, but we'll just use this patch for now since it seems to work
